title: Opinions on Halsey and BTS 'Boy With Luv'.? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have no knowledge of Halseys background, nor do I care what so ever. I only listened to Boy with Luv because I love BTS. However based on what I heard. I think she made the song a lot worse. I mean I heard both versions (In case you didnt know, theres an album ver. and a mv. ver, both have different amount of Halsey parts) and I think the song would’ve been much better with ONLY BTS. Also.. The “I WANT IT” line makes me cringe so hard. and her “Oh MYMYMY” just doesn't sound as good as how Jungkook sang it Overall I’d MUCH MUCH rather listen to the version where Jungkook and V replace Halseys lines. Her voice was just so unappealing in this song and she sounded like an annoying little girl.
